name: SafeWaze Roofer's Basic Kit
description: A no-nonsense kit with harness, lifeline, and anchor—ideal for small crews just trying to pass their first inspection.
target_audience_match: Perfect for small roofing crews who just want to stay legal without spending hours on research.

name: Werner Roofing Safety System
description: Comfort-focused gear with multi-day durability—ideal for crews tackling multi-roof projects or longer timelines.
target_audience_match: Great for growing teams who need reliable protection they won’t dread wearing day after day.

name: 3M DBI-SALA Compliance Kit
description: Trusted by pros for passing audits, this OSHA-grade kit includes a shock lanyard, reusable anchor, and ergonomic harness.
target_audience_match: Perfect for professional roofers who never want to worry about surprise inspections again.

name: Guardian Fall Protection Kit
description: A go-to safety starter pack with harness, 50 ft. lifeline, and anchor—ideal for new hires or subcontractor kits.
target_audience_match: Ideal for contractors who need to onboard new hires without risking a compliance gap.
